item.title: A Practical Guide to Deploying Search Foundation Models in Production
item.description: We offer detailed cost and performance breakdowns for three deployment strategies: Jina API, self-hosted K8s, and AWS SageMaker, to help you make the right decision.
item.dc:creator: Saahil Ognawala

item.title: What Should We Learn From ModernBERT?
item.description: Bigger training data, efficient parameter sizing, and a deep-but-thin architecture, ModernBERT sets a direction for future BERT-like models.
item.dc:creator: Nan Wang

item.title: ReaderLM v2: Frontier Small Language Model for HTML to Markdown and JSON
item.description: ReaderLM-v2 is a 1.5B small language model for HTML-to-Markdown conversion and HTML-to-JSON extraction with exceptional quality.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI

item.title: Text-Image Global Contrastive Alignment and Token-Patch Local Alignment
item.description: CLIP can visualize token-patch similarities, however, it’s more of a post-hoc interpretability trick than a robust or official "attention" from the model. Here's why.
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Text Embeddings Fail to Capture Word Order and How to Fix It
item.description: Text embedding models struggle with capturing subtle linguistic nuances like word order, directional relationships, temporal sequences, causal connections, comparisons, and negation. Understanding these challenges is key to improving model performance.
item.dc:creator: Bo Wang

item.title: Re·Search: Order 2024 Yearbook of Search Foundation Advances
item.description: Discover Re·Search, our premium yearbook showcasing our best research articles and search foundation models in 2024. Featuring spot UV-coated hardcover, 160 full-color pages, and meticulous design throughout. Available worldwide at $35, shipping included.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI

item.title: Scaling Test-Time Compute For Embedding Models
item.description: Better results scale with compute—more on learning, more on search. A good pretrained model takes you far, but test-time compute takes you further. It's time to recognize this paradigm of test-time compute, even for embedding models.
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Still Need Chunking When Long-Context Models Can Do It All?
item.description: Comparing how long-context embedding models perform with different chunking strategies to find the optimal approach for your needs.
item.dc:creator: Michael Günther

item.title: Watermarking Text with Embedding Models to Protect Against Content Theft
item.description: You use our embedding models to do what? This might be the most "out-of-domain" applications of embeddings we learned at EMNLP 2024.
item.dc:creator: Han Xiao

item.title: Jina CLIP v2: Multilingual Multimodal Embeddings for Text and Images
item.description: Jina-CLIP v2, a 0.9B multimodal embedding model with multilingual support of 89 languages, high image resolution at 512x512, and Matryoshka representations.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI

item.title: Meta-Prompt for Better Jina API Integration and CodeGen
item.description: Is Meta-Prompt the new norm for API specs? Feed it to LLMs and generate integration code that reliably integrates Jina's APIs, saving you from the usual trial-and-error process.
item.dc:creator: Alex C-G

item.title: Call for Participants: EMNLP 2024 BoF on Embeddings, Reranker & Small LMs for Better Search
item.description: At EMNLP 2024 Miami? Join us for a Birds of a Feather session focusing on embeddings, rerankers, and small LMs for better search.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI

item.title: Beyond CLIP: How Jina-CLIP Advances Multimodal Search
item.description: Learn how Jina-CLIP enhances OpenAI's CLIP with better retrieval accuracy and more diverse results through unified text-image embeddings.
item.dc:creator: Bo Wang

item.title: Finding Optimal Breakpoints in Long Documents Using Small Language Models
item.description: We trained three small language models to better segment long documents into chunks, and here are the key lessons we learned.
item.dc:creator: Andrei Ungureanu

item.title: Jina Classifier API for High Performance Zero-Shot and Few-Shot Classification
item.description: New Classifier API offers zero-shot and few-shot classification for text and images. Start classifying content instantly or train it with your own examples.
item.dc:creator: Jina AI
